duties_responsibilities.duty: Support the development and execution of company projects by assisting Sr Project Manager(s) and/or Principal Project Manager(s) in the completion of transmission, substation, distribution, and/or gas projects.
Participate and assist in the development and management of project scope, schedule, budget, risks, and safety performance under the guidance of an experienced Project Management professional.
Provide analytical and operational support to the Project Management function beginning with project inception, through development and execution of project plans, and project closeout.
Assist in the coordination and management of assigned projects, ensuring work is performed in a safe manner, within deadline and budget.
Establish and maintain strong professional relationships with internal and external project stakeholders to answer questions, provide data, and coordinate project activities as needed.
Monitor and track project status, prepare, review, and analyze reports.
Help maintain the company's good standing with customers and stakeholders in regard to supporting projects with a direct link to the customer.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Engineering, or related discipline and 0-2 years relevant experience, OR in lieu of a bachelor's degree, a minimum of 2-5 years of relevant experience.
Customer driven with good oral and written communication skills.
Ability to analyze basic problems/situations and recommend alternative courses of action.
Excellent planning and organizational skills with a focus on achieving desired results.
Demonstrated proficiency in PC software packages such as Microsoft Word and Excel.
Job requires a valid driver's license and use of personal vehicle.
